attributes.additional_details:
I am a 21 year old driver with a clean driving history .I passed on my first test and have been driving for three years safely and sensibly,being the second driver on my fathers insurance policy.Having recently aquiring employment further away from home means I have to have my own car for which I ofcourse require a car and insurance,the quotes I am recieving range from £4,000 to £14,000 some of the companies will not even give me a quote.My frustration and annoyance lead me to ask for your help what can I do to convince the insurance companies to insure me at a reasonable price.As you can understand I need my car in order to keep my job.
I urge you to help all drivers,young and old to overcome this huge issue and to create a situation where everyone who needs a car can be allowed to drive without these obstacles.

Looking forward to hearing from you.
Yours sincerely,
Mohammad Ali
